title: Looks like the large corner lot at Market Street and 9th Ave.(old Rippy Cadillac lot) is becoming a junk yard for unlicensed cars/trucks.It is unsightly for our downtown. Is that property zoned for such use?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2015/04/is-the-lot-at-9th-and-market-zoned-for-the-abandoned-cars-left-there/
